price: 29. Ne garde pas ta main enchaînée à ton cou, ni ne l’étends exagérément,[289] ou tu t’en trouveras blâmé et plein de regrets.
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا
footnotes: [289] Ne sois ni avare ni dépensier.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿal yadaka maghlūlatan ilā ʿunuqika walā tabsuṭ'hā kulla al-basṭi fataqʿuda malūman maḥsūran
